data: LIKE MOST OTHER CHILDREN, WHO SHOULD BE MY GODFATHER IS DECIDED BY MAMMON—SO PRECOCIOUS AS TO MAKE SOME NOISE IN THE WORLD, AND BE HUNG A FEW DAYS AFTER I WAS BORN—CUT DOWN IN TIME, AND PRODUCE A SCENE OF BLOODSHED—MY EARLY PROPENSITIES FULLY DEVELOPED BY THE CHOICE OF MY PROFESSION.
Japhet in Search of a Father
browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: humour|category: adventure|category: novels|category: british literature
